actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to require that States receiving Byrne JAG funds to require sensitivity training for law enforcement officers of that State and to incentivize States to enact laws requiring the independent investigation and prosecution of the use of deadly force by law enforcement officers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Police Training and Independent Review Act of 2017
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

titles.title: Police Training and Independent Review Act of 2017
Police Training and Independent Review Act of 2017

A bill to require that States receiving Byrne JAG funds to require sensitivity training for law enforcement officers of that State and to incentivize States to enact laws requiring the independent investigation and prosecution of the use of deadly force by law enforcement officers, and for other purposes.
Police Training and Independent Review Act of 2017
